name: Group Project 1
description: This was our first group project, in which we made a useful resource for new coders. We wanted to create an all-in-one site for the basics of coding.

name: Daily Calendar
description: The assignment was to build a Daily Calendar. During the hours shown, colors will signify future, current, and past times.

name: Quiz Time
description: The assignment was to build a quiz. There are only 10 questions, but I need to figure out how to end the quiz and tally a score.

name: Weather App
description: The assignment was to build a Weather App. Input your city and you'll be able to find out the current and upcoming weather.

name: Password Generator
description: The assignment was to build a password generator. Input the requirements you would like for you password.
